title: Hana Cross packs on the PDA with new beau Nasser Alfallah after a Halloween party
text:
She was spotted leaving Paris Hilton's Halloween Party after her ex-boyfriend Brooklyn Beckham arrived on Thursday.

Yet the near run-in didn't stop Hana Cross from going to another spooky-themed party with her new beau Nasser Alfallah on Friday night.

The model, 22, was pictured packing on the PDA with her boyfriend as they walked hand-in-hand home from their second night out in two days.

Beau: Hanna Cross, 22, was pictured holding her boyfriend's hand on Friday as the couple made their way home from their second Halloween party of the week in LA

Hana showed off her toned torso with a lacy bralette and layered the look with a black denim jacket with a USA patch sewn in.

She teamed the item of clothing with black flared trousers and a belt with silver studs balanced loosely over her hips.

The couple appeared loved-up as she held his hand and he led her home after the Halloween party.

Close: The model, 22, showed off her toned torso with a lacy bralette and layered the look with a black denim jacket with a USA patch sewn in

Nasser, 19, wore an all-black ensemble and had a white bandanna tied around his left knee.

He finished his look with a pair of black Converse trainers and wore a baseball hat on his head.

It comes after Brooklyn, 20, faced a near-certain run-in with his ex-girlfriend Hana when they attended the same Halloween party in Beverly Hills.

To make matters all the more awkward for the former flames, Hanna arrived at the soirée with Nasser.

Night on the town: Hanna and her new boyfriend Nasser attended Paris Hilton's Halloween party in Beverly Hills, California, on Thursday night avoiding an awkward run-in with her ex Brooklyn Beckham

As the gathering got underway, Hanna and Nasser shared snaps of themselves partying in costume on Instagram, while Brooklyn kept his night of revelry off social media after making a low-key arrival with a bandanna tied around his face.

The new couple went all out for their night on the town, with Hana wearing a skimpy American Indian-inspired costume, complete with a headdress.

She teamed her controversial ensemble with a pair of gladiator sandals, while a black leather jacket helped stave off the night chill en route to and leaving the bash.

For his part, Nasser dressed up as a cowboy in a black shirt and matching wide-brimmed hat, which he teamed with a pair of blue embroidered jeans.

Meanwhile, Brooklyn was a lot less easy to spot, teaming his red bandanna with a Bob Marley T-shirt, which was ripped under the arms, and black trousers.

Hana's new love interest was recently revealed by MailOnline to be Nasser, who is a Loyola Marymount University student in Los Angeles and is originally from Kuwait.

Revealed: Hana's new love interest was recently revealed by MailOnline to be Nasser, who is a Loyola Marymount University student in Los Angeles and is originally from Kuwait

On Tuesday, Hana was seen packing on the PDA with Nasser as they loitered around in a car park outside trendy eatery Nobu with a group of their pals.

Nasser, whose older sister is Mick Jagger's ex Noor Alfallah, gripped her close, as she flaunted her svelte frame in baggy black sweatpants and a matching beanie hat.

Hana dated Brooklyn for nine months but became known for having several high-profile arguments in public, before splitting.
description: The model, 22, was pictured packing on the PDA with her boyfriend as they walked hand-in-hand home from their second night out in two days.
